Event.name: Sentencing
Event.definition:
<def-root>During a court appearance, a <fen>Sentence</fen>, generally a punishment, is imposed on the <fen>Convict</fen> by a <fen>Court</fen>, usually represented by a judge.
<ex><fex name="Court">The judge</fex> <t>sentenced</t> <fex name="Convict">Martha Stewart</fex> <fex name="Sentence">to 2 years in prison</fex> <fex name="Offense">for insider trading</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Convict
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Convict</fen> is given a <fen>Sentence</fen> by the <fen>Court</fen>. <ex>Judge Duncan <t>sentenced</t> <fex name="Convict">Marty</fex> to five years under house detention.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Court
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Court</fen> imposes a <fen>Sentence</fen> on a <fen>Convict</fen>. <ex><fex name="Court">Judge Duncan</fex> <t>sentenced</t> Marty to five years under house detention.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Sentence
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Sentence</fen> is imposed on the <fen>Convict</fen> by the <fen>Court</fen>. <ex>Judge Duncan <t>sentenced</t> Marty <fex name="Sentence">to five years under house detention</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Type
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes the type of sentence. <ex><fex name="Convict">He</fex> will receive a <fex name="Type">prison</fex> <fex name="Sentence"><t>sentence</t></fex> if convicted.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Term_of_sentence
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes the duration of the sentence. <ex><fex name="Convict">Tom</fex> will recieve a <fex name="Sentence"><t>sentence</t></fex> <fex name="Term_of_sentence">of five years</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The Time when the <fen>Convict</fen> is sentenced.
<ex>He will be <t>sentenced</t> <fex name="tim">at a later date</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Offense
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The illegal action of which the <fen>Convict</fen> has been found guilty and for which they are punished.
<ex>A pet store owner was <t>sentenced</t> <fex name="off">for illegaly smuggling protected reptiles</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location of the sentencing <fen>Court</fen>.
<ex>Biancaniello will be <t>sentenced</t> <fex name="pla">in San Francisco</fex> later this summer.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The state that the <fen>Convict</fen> is in at the time of their sentencing.
<ex>He was <t>sentenced</t> <fex name="dep">in absentia</fex> during the mass trials.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: sentence.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: declare the punishment decided for (an offender).

lexUnit.name: sentence.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the punishment assigned to a defendant found guilty by a court.

lexUnit.name: order.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: force the convict to pay or serve in the prison as punishment

lexUnit.name: condemn.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: sentence to a punishment, especially death.
